# Bibliography
## Overview
**Bibliography**

## A
**Abandoned Arts**

Daron Woodson. *Class Acts: Gunslingers.* Abandoned Arts. 2012.

Daron Woodson. *Class Acts: Gunslinger Archetypes.* Abandoned Arts. 2012.

**Asparagus Jumpsuit Games**

Berin Kinsman. *Character Workbook: Gunslinger.* Asparagus Jumpsuit Games. 2013, 2014.

## K
**The Knotty-Works**

N. Jolly. *Player Paraphernalia #89 Lead in the Air (New Gunslinger Archetypes)*. The Knotty-Works. 2016.

## P
**Paizo**

Jason Bulmahn. *Pathfinder Roleplaying Advanced Player's Guide*. Paizo Publishing LLC. 2010.

Jason Bulmahn. *Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Core Rulebook*. Paizo Publishing LLC. 2010.

Dennis Baker, Jesse Benner, Benjamin Bruck, Jason Buhlman, Brian J. Cortijo, Jim Groves, Tim Hitchcock, Richard A. Hunt, Colin McComb, Jason Nelson, Tom Phillips, Patrick Renie, Sean K Reynolds, and Russ Taylor. *Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Ultimate Combat*. Paizo Publishing LLC. 2011.

## R
**Rite Publishing** 

Steven D. Russell. *The Secrets of the Gunslinger*. Rite Publishing. 2011.

## S
**Sunburst Games**

Kris Leonard. *Realms of Atrothia-Legacy Races Revisited*. Sunburst Games. 2018

**Super Genius Games**

Owen K.C. Stephens. *Ultimate Options: Grit and Gunslingers.* Super Genius Games. 2011.
